list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Update workspace configuration for MediSearch service integration
Integrates updated IDE configurations related to the implementation of the MediSearch service with Flask. Includes task metadata and commit message information documenting MediSearch API querying and Flask application setup.

component.name: FlaskConsoleOptions

option.name: myCustomStartScript

task.summary:
Implement MediSearch service with Flask integration
Add MediSearchService for querying the MediSearch API and integrate it with a Flask application. Also include project setup files (.env, .gitignore, IDE configurations) and utility modules (responses and configuration loading).

Update workspace configuration for MediSearch service integration
Integrates updated IDE configurations related to the implementation of the MediSearch service with Flask. Includes task metadata and commit message information documenting MediSearch API querying and Flask application setup.
